page.title: 09A day in the life of Claire.
page.content: I get up at 7.30am and have a cup of tea.After getting dressed I leave for school with my mum and brother.I start school at 8.55. After assembly we work until 10.30am.For 15 minutes we usually play games.After playtime we work until 11.55 when we have lunch. During the afternoon I continue my lessons.If it's sunny we work outside or play games.At 3.15 pm I walk home. When I get home I change into my playing clothes, call for my friends and go to the recreation playground. At about 5pm I go home for something to eat.Usually I watch television.My favourite kind of programmes are cartoons,films and serials. At about 8 pm I get ready for bed and go to my room to read . At weekends I lay in bed until 9 pm. Usually I help my parents with the shopping in the afternoon.
